original_title: 実録！！ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像２８
overview: The 28th installment of a popular series that carefully selects horror videos that have been posted. A contributor who enjoys traveling is turning the camera around at the hotel he's staying at as a camera test, but at that time, a really mysterious person comes into view.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 28
